title: Pacific Northwest Road Trip
description: Week-long adventure exploring the stunning landscapes of Washington and Oregon, from Seattle's urban attractions to Portland's food scene and the natural beauty of the Pacific coast.

title: Southwest National Parks Tour
description: Epic journey through the most spectacular national parks in the Southwest. Challenging hikes, breathtaking canyons, and unforgettable desert landscapes.

title: Southern Music & History
description: Valentine's weekend exploring the rich musical heritage and mysterious history of the American South.

title: East Coast City Tour
description: Comprehensive tour of America's historic East Coast cities, combining art, culture, history, and urban exploration.

title: Alaska Adventure
description: Planning an incredible wilderness expedition to explore Alaska's glaciers, wildlife, and pristine natural beauty. Dates to be determined based on best season for wildlife viewing.

title: Texas BBQ Weekend
description: Ultimate food lover's pilgrimage to Austin for authentic Texas BBQ and live music scene.

title: Desert Stargazing Retreat
description: New Year's retreat under the darkest skies in North America. Perfect for astrophotography and peaceful reflection.

title: Florida Keys Getaway
description: Winter escape to tropical paradise with snorkeling, beach time, and fresh seafood.
